summary:
Heya! this is my first mod in a while, but anyways, its just a bunch of unique and funky field grass textures! 3 Different Styles!
IT FITS IN BETTER IF you go to your skyrimprefs.ini and set itexmipmapskip and itexmipmapminimum higher, you will also get a nice fps boost!
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#6aa84f][size=6][center]Unique and Funky Field Grasses![/center][/size][/color][/font][/b][/u][size=3]Hey there! this mod gives you 3 very different and funky textures to replace your field grass![/size]
[size=3]Style 1 - Painting[/size]
[size=3]Style 2 - Pixelated[/size]
[size=3]Style 3 - Funky[/size]

[size=3]NOTE: THIS IS CURRENTLY [/size][u][b]ONLY[/b][/u][size=3] FOR FIELDGRASSOBJ01.dds AND FIELDGRASSOBJ02.dds, And textures are in 2k :P
[/size]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff0000][u][b][size=4]IT FITS IN BETTER IF you go to your skyrimprefs.ini and set itexmipmapskip and itexmipmapminimum higher, you will also get a nice fps boost![/size][/b][/u]
[/color][/font]
[b]INSTALATION:[/b][size=3] Same as any texture mod, just drag the "data" folder to your install directory.[/size]

PLEASE Endorse mods you like!

[size=3][b][u]MY OTHER MODS!!![/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58388]Non ENB Sun Glare Effects![/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58421]Realistic IMAGINATOR Preset!
[/url][/b][/size]
[b]WANT TO SUPPORT ME? I'D APPRECIATE A SUB TO [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFhyAm3BQc2ziLwmdiv84_A]MY CHANNEL...[/url][/b]
author: TH3CR4PM4N
